alert.note: Alert for Baker (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:26PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NASSAU... NORTHEASTERN BRADFORD...SOUTHERN BAKER AND UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EST... At 226 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Glen St. Mary to Lulu to Providence. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Butler, Raiford, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence, Olustee, Beasley, and Sanderson. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for northern and northeastern Florida.
